013package org.apache.juneau.config.internal;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.StringUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.ThrowableUtils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.common.internal.Utils.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.config.event.ConfigEventType.*;
020
021import java.io.*;
022import java.util.*;
023import java.util.concurrent.*;
024import java.util.stream.*;
025
026import org.apache.juneau.*;
027import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.config.event.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.config.store.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
032
033/**
034 * Represents the parsed contents of a configuration.
035 */
036public class ConfigMap implements ConfigStoreListener {
037
038   private final ConfigStore store;         // The store that created this object.
039   private volatile String contents;        // The original contents of this object.
040   final String name;                       // The name  of this object.
041
042   // Changes that have been applied since the last load.
043   private final List<ConfigEvent> changes = synced(new ConfigEvents());
044
045   // Registered listeners listening for changes during saves or reloads.
046   private final Set<ConfigEventListener> listeners = synced(Utils.set());
047
048   // The parsed entries of this map with all changes applied.
049   final Map<String,ConfigSection> entries = synced(map());
050
051   // The original entries of this map before any changes were applied.
052   final Map<String,ConfigSection> oentries = synced(map());
053
054   // Import statements in this config.
055   final List<Import> imports = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
056
057   private final SimpleReadWriteLock lock = new SimpleReadWriteLock();
058
059   /**
060    * Constructor.
061    *
062    * @param store The config store.
063    * @param name The config name.
064    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
065    */
066   public ConfigMap(ConfigStore store, String name) throws IOException {
067      this.store = store;
068      this.name = name;
069      load(store.read(name));
070   }
071
072   ConfigMap(ConfigStore store, String name, String contents) throws IOException {
073      this.store = store;
074      this.name = name;
075      load(contents);
076   }
077
078   private ConfigMap load(String contents) throws IOException {
079      if (contents == null)
080         contents = "";
081      this.contents = contents;
082
083      entries.clear();
084      oentries.clear();
085      imports.forEach(Import::unregisterAll);
086      imports.clear();
087
088      var imports2 = mapOf(String.class, ConfigMap.class);
089
090      List<String> lines = new LinkedList<>();
091      try (var scanner = new Scanner(contents)) {
092         while (scanner.hasNextLine()) {
093            var line = scanner.nextLine();
094            var c = firstChar(line);
095            var c2 = StringUtils.lastNonWhitespaceChar(line);
096            if (c == '[') {
097               var l = line.trim();
098               if (c2 != ']' || ! isValidNewSectionName(l.substring(1, l.length()-1)))
099                  throw new ConfigException("Invalid section name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
100            } else if (c == '<') {
101               var l = line.trim();
102               var i = l.indexOf('>');
103               if (i != -1) {
104                  var l2 = l.substring(1, i);
105                  if (! isValidConfigName(l2))
106                     throw new ConfigException("Invalid import config name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
107                  var l3 = l.substring(i+1);
108                  if (! (Utils.isEmpty(l3) || firstChar(l3) == '#'))
109                     throw new ConfigException("Invalid import config name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
110                  var importName = l2.trim();
111                  try {
112                     if (! imports2.containsKey(importName))
113                        imports2.put(importName, store.getMap(importName));
114                  } catch (StackOverflowError e) {
115                     throw new IOException("Import loop detected in configuration '"+name+"'->'"+importName+"'");
116                  }
117               }
118            }
119            lines.add(line);
120         }
121      }
122
123      List<Import> irl = Utils.listOfSize(imports2.size());
124      forEachReverse(listFrom(imports2.values()), x -> irl.add(new Import(x).register(listeners)));
125      this.imports.addAll(irl);
126
127      // Add [blank] section.
128      var inserted = false;
129      var foundComment = false;
130      for (var li = lines.listIterator(); li.hasNext();) {
131         var l = li.next();
132         var c = firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
133         if (c != '#') {
134            if (c == 0 && foundComment) {
135               li.set("[]");
136               inserted = true;
137            }
138            break;
139         }
140         foundComment = true;
141      }
142      if (! inserted)
143         lines.add(0, "[]");
144
145      // Collapse any multi-lines.
146      var li = lines.listIterator(lines.size());
147      String accumulator = null;
148      while (li.hasPrevious()) {
149         var l = li.previous();
150         var c = firstChar(l);
151         if (c == '\t') {
152            c = firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
153            if (c != '#') {
154               if (accumulator == null)
155                  accumulator = l.substring(1);
156               else
157                  accumulator = l.substring(1) + "\n" + accumulator;  // NOSONAR - Intentionally not using StringBuilder.
158               li.remove();
159            }
160         } else if (accumulator != null) {
161            li.set(l + "\n" + accumulator);
162            accumulator = null;
163         }
164      }
165
166      lines = copyOf(lines);
167      var last = lines.size()-1;
168
169      final int
170         S1 = 1, // Looking for section.
171         S2 = 2; // Found section, looking for start.
172
173      var state = S1;
174
175      var sections = listOf(ConfigSection.class);
176
177      for (var i = last; i >= 0; i--) {
178         var l = lines.get(i);
179         var c = firstChar(l);
180
181         if (state == S1) {
182            if (c == '[') {
183               state = S2;
184            }
185         } else {
186            if (c != '#' && (c == '[' || l.indexOf('=') != -1)) {
187               sections.add(new ConfigSection(lines.subList(i+1, last+1)));
188               last = i + 1;
189               state = (c == '[' ? S2 : S1);
190            }
191         }
192      }
193
194      sections.add(new ConfigSection(lines.subList(0, last+1)));
195
196      for (var i = sections.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
197         var cs = sections.get(i);
198         if (entries.containsKey(cs.name))
199            throw new ConfigException("Duplicate section found in configuration:  [{0}]", cs.name);
200         entries.put(cs.name, cs);
201       }
202
203      oentries.putAll(entries);
204      return this;
205   }
206
207   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
208   // Getters
209   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
210
211   /**
212    * Reads an entry from this map.
213    *
214    * @param section
215    *    The section name.
216    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
217    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
218    * @param key
219    *    The entry key.
220    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
221    * @return The entry, or <jk>null</jk> if the entry doesn't exist.
222    */
223   public ConfigMapEntry getEntry(String section, String key) {
224      checkSectionName(section);
225      checkKeyName(key);
226      try (var x = lock.read()) {
227         var cs = entries.get(section);
228         var ce = cs == null ? null : cs.entries.get(key);
229
230         if (ce == null)
231            ce = imports.stream().map(y -> y.getConfigMap().getEntry(section, key)).filter(y -> y != null).findFirst().orElse(null);
232
233         return ce;
234      }
235   }
236
237   /**
238    * Returns the pre-lines on the specified section.
239    *
240    * <p>
241    * The pre-lines are all lines such as blank lines and comments that preceed a section.
242    *
243    * @param section
244    *    The section name.
245    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
246    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
247    * @return
248    *    An unmodifiable list of lines, or <jk>null</jk> if the section doesn't exist.
249    */
250   public List<String> getPreLines(String section) {
251      checkSectionName(section);
252      try (var x = lock.read()) {
253         var cs = entries.get(section);
254         return cs == null ? null : cs.preLines;
255      }
256   }
257
258   /**
259    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
260    *
261    * @return
262    *    An unmodifiable set of keys.
263    */
264   public Set<String> getSections() {
265      var s = imports.isEmpty() ? entries.keySet() : setOf(String.class);
266      if (! imports.isEmpty()) {
267         imports.forEach(x -> s.addAll(x.getConfigMap().getSections()));
268         s.addAll(entries.keySet());
269      }
270      return u(s);
271   }
272
273   /**
274    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
275    *
276    * @param section
277    *    The section name.
278    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
279    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
280    * @return
281    *    An unmodifiable set of keys, or an empty set if the section doesn't exist.
282    */
283   public Set<String> getKeys(String section) {
284      checkSectionName(section);
285      var cs = entries.get(section);
286      var s = imports.isEmpty() && cs != null ? cs.entries.keySet() : Utils.<String>set();
287      if (! imports.isEmpty()) {
288         imports.forEach(x -> s.addAll(x.getConfigMap().getKeys(section)));
289         if (cs != null)
290            s.addAll(cs.entries.keySet());
291      }
292      return u(s);
293   }
294
295   /**
296    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this config has the specified section.
297    *
298    * @param section
299    *    The section name.
300    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
301    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
302    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this config has the specified section.
303    */
304   public boolean hasSection(String section) {
305      checkSectionName(section);
306      return entries.get(section) != null || imports.stream().anyMatch(x -> x.getConfigMap().hasSection(section));
307   }
308
309   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
310   // Setters
311   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
312
313   /**
314    * Adds a new section or replaces the pre-lines on an existing section.
315    *
316    * @param section
317    *    The section name.
318    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
319    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
320    * @param preLines
321    *    The pre-lines on the section.
322    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
323    * @return This object.
324    */
325   public ConfigMap setSection(String section, List<String> preLines) {
326      checkSectionName(section);
327      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.setSection(name, section, preLines));
328   }
329
330   /**
331    * Adds or overwrites an existing entry.
332    *
333    * @param section
334    *    The section name.
335    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
336    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
337    * @param key
338    *    The entry key.
339    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
340    * @param value
341    *    The entry value.
342    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
343    * @param modifiers
344    *    Optional modifiers.
345    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
346    * @param comment
347    *    Optional comment.
348    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
349    * @param preLines
350    *    Optional pre-lines.
351    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
352    * @return This object.
353    */
354   public ConfigMap setEntry(String section, String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
355      checkSectionName(section);
356      checkKeyName(key);
357      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, section, key, value, modifiers, comment, preLines));
358   }
359
360
361   /**
362    * Not implemented.
363    *
364    * @param section
365    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
366    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
367    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
368    * @param importName
369    *    The import name.
370    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
371    * @param preLines
372    *    Optional comment and blank lines to add immediately before the import statement.
373    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, previous pre-lines will not be replaced.
374    * @return This object.
375    */
376   public ConfigMap setImport(String section, String importName, List<String> preLines) {
377      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented.");
378   }
379
380   /**
381    * Removes a section.
382    *
383    * <p>
384    * This eliminates all entries in the section as well.
385    *
386    * @param section
387    *    The section name.
388    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
389    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
390    * @return This object.
391    */
392   public ConfigMap removeSection(String section) {
393      checkSectionName(section);
394      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.removeSection(name, section));
395   }
396
397   /**
398    * Removes an entry.
399    *
400    * @param section
401    *    The section name.
402    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
403    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
404    * @param key
405    *    The entry key.
406    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
407    * @return This object.
408    */
409   public ConfigMap removeEntry(String section, String key) {
410      checkSectionName(section);
411      checkKeyName(key);
412      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, section, key));
413   }
414
415   /**
416    * Not implemented.
417    *
418    * @param section
419    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
420    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
421    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
422    * @param importName
423    *    The import name.
424    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
425    * @return This object.
426    */
427   public ConfigMap removeImport(String section, String importName) {
428      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented.");
429   }
430
431   private ConfigMap applyChange(boolean addToChangeList, ConfigEvent ce) {
432      if (ce == null)
433         return this;
434      try (var x = lock.write()) {
435         var section = ce.getSection();
436         var cs = entries.get(section);
437         if (ce.getType() == SET_ENTRY) {
438            if (cs == null) {
439               cs = new ConfigSection(section);
440               entries.put(section, cs);
441            }
442            var oe = cs.entries.get(ce.getKey());
443            if (oe == null)
444               oe = ConfigMapEntry.NULL;
445            cs.addEntry(
446               ce.getKey(),
447               ce.getValue() == null ? oe.value : ce.getValue(),
448               ce.getModifiers() == null ? oe.modifiers : ce.getModifiers(),
449               ce.getComment() == null ? oe.comment : ce.getComment(),
450               ce.getPreLines() == null ? oe.preLines : ce.getPreLines()
451            );
452         } else if (ce.getType() == SET_SECTION) {
453            if (cs == null) {
454               cs = new ConfigSection(section);
455               entries.put(section, cs);
456            }
457            if (ce.getPreLines() != null)
458               cs.setPreLines(ce.getPreLines());
459         } else if (ce.getType() == REMOVE_ENTRY) {
460            if (cs != null)
461               cs.entries.remove(ce.getKey());
462         } else if (ce.getType() == REMOVE_SECTION) {
463            if (cs != null)  // NOSONAR - Intentional.
464               entries.remove(section);
465         }
466         if (addToChangeList)
467            changes.add(ce);
468      }
469      return this;
470   }
471
472   /**
473    * Overwrites the contents of the config file.
474    *
475    * @param contents The new contents of the config file.
476    * @param synchronous Wait until the change has been persisted before returning this map.
477    * @return This object.
478    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
479    * @throws InterruptedException Thread was interrupted.
480    */
481   public ConfigMap load(String contents, boolean synchronous) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
482
483      if (synchronous) {
484         final var latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
485         var listener = (ConfigStoreListener) x -> latch.countDown();
486         store.register(name, listener);
487         store.write(name, null, contents);
488         if (latch.await(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS)) {
489            store.unregister(name, listener);
490         } else {
491            throw new ConfigException("Unable to store contents of config to store.");
492         }
493      } else {
494         store.write(name, null, contents);
495      }
496      return this;
497   }
498
499   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
500   // Lifecycle events
501   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
502
503   /**
504    * Persist any changes made to this map and signal all listeners.
505    *
506    * <p>
507    * If the underlying contents of the file have changed, this will reload it and apply the changes
508    * on top of the modified file.
509    *
510    * <p>
511    * Subsequent changes made to the underlying file will also be signaled to all listeners.
512    *
513    * <p>
514    * We try saving the file up to 10 times.
515    * <br>If the file keeps changing on the file system, we throw an exception.
516    *
517    * @return This object.
518    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
519    */
520   public ConfigMap commit() throws IOException {
521      try (var x = lock.write()) {
522         var newContents = asString();
523         for (var i = 0; i <= 10; i++) {
524            if (i == 10)
525               throw new ConfigException("Unable to store contents of config to store.");
526            var currentContents = store.write(name, contents, newContents);
527            if (currentContents == null)
528               break;
529            onChange(currentContents);
530         }
531         this.changes.clear();
532      }
533      return this;
534   }
535
536   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
537   // Listeners
538   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
539
540   /**
541    * Registers an event listener on this map.
542    *
543    * @param listener The new listener.
544    * @return This object.
545    */
546   public ConfigMap register(ConfigEventListener listener) {
547      listeners.add(listener);
548      imports.forEach(x -> x.register(listener));
549      return this;
550   }
551
552   boolean hasEntry(String section, String key) {
553      var cs = entries.get(section);
554      var ce = cs == null ? null : cs.entries.get(key);
555      return ce != null;
556   }
557
558   /**
559    * Unregisters an event listener from this map.
560    *
561    * @param listener The listener to remove.
562    * @return This object.
563    */
564   public ConfigMap unregister(ConfigEventListener listener) {
565      listeners.remove(listener);
566      imports.forEach(x -> x.register(listener));
567      return this;
568   }
569
570   /**
571    * Returns the listeners currently associated with this config map.
572    *
573    * @return The listeners currently associated with this config map.
574    */
575   public Set<ConfigEventListener> getListeners() {
576      return u(listeners);
577   }
578
579   @Override /* ConfigStoreListener */
580   public void onChange(String newContents) {
581      ConfigEvents changes2 = null;
582      try (var x = lock.write()) {
583         if (Utils.ne(contents, newContents)) {
584            changes2 = findDiffs(newContents);
585            load(newContents);
586
587            // Reapply our changes on top of the modifications.
588            this.changes.forEach(y -> applyChange(false, y));
589         }
590      } catch (IOException e) {
591         throw asRuntimeException(e);
592      }
593      if (changes2 != null && ! changes2.isEmpty())
594         signal(changes2);
595   }
596
597   @Override /* Object */
598   public String toString() {
599      try (var x = lock.read()) {
600         return asString();
601      }
602   }
603
604   /**
605    * Returns the values in this config map as a map of maps.
606    *
607    * <p>
608    * This is considered a snapshot copy of the config map.
609    *
610    * <p>
611    * The returned map is modifiable, but modifications to the returned map are not reflected in the config map.
612    *
613    * @return A copy of this config as a map of maps.
614    */
615   public JsonMap asMap() {
616      var m = new JsonMap();
617      try (var x = lock.read()) {
618         imports.forEach(y -> m.putAll(y.getConfigMap().asMap()));
619         entries.values().forEach(z -> {
620            var m2 = mapOf(String.class, String.class);
621            z.entries.values().forEach(y -> m2.put(y.key, y.value));
622            m.put(z.name, m2);
623         });
624      }
625      return m;
626   }
627
628   /**
629    * Serializes this map to the specified writer.
630    *
631    * @param w The writer to serialize to.
632    * @return The same writer passed in.
633    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
634    */
635   public Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
636      try (var x = lock.read()) {
637         for (var cs : entries.values())
638            cs.writeTo(w);
639      }
640      return w;
641   }
642
643   /**
644    * Does a rollback of any changes on this map currently in memory.
645    *
646    * @return This object.
647    */
648   public ConfigMap rollback() {
649      if (!changes.isEmpty()) {
650         try (var x = lock.write()) {
651            changes.clear();
652            load(contents);
653         } catch (IOException e) {
654            throw asRuntimeException(e);
655         }
656      }
657      return this;
658   }
659
660   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
661   // Private methods
662   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
663
664   private void checkSectionName(String s) {
665      if (! ("".equals(s) || isValidNewSectionName(s)))
666         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid section name: '"+s+"'");
667   }
668
669   private void checkKeyName(String s) {
670      if (! isValidKeyName(s))
671         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid key name: '"+s+"'");
672   }
673
674   private boolean isValidKeyName(String s) {
675      if (s == null)
676         return false;
677      s = s.trim();
678      if (s.isEmpty())
679         return false;
680      for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
681         var c = s.charAt(i);
682         if (c == '/' || c == '\\' || c == '[' || c == ']' || c == '=' || c == '#')
683            return false;
684      }
685      return true;
686   }
687
688   private boolean isValidNewSectionName(String s) {
689      if (s == null)
690         return false;
691      s = s.trim();
692      if (s.isEmpty())
693         return false;
694      for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
695         var c = s.charAt(i);
696         if (c == '/' || c == '\\' || c == '[' || c == ']')
697            return false;
698      }
699      return true;
700   }
701
702   private boolean isValidConfigName(String s) {
703      if (s == null)
704         return false;
705      s = s.trim();
706      if (s.isEmpty())
707         return false;
708      for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
709         var c = s.charAt(i);
710         if (i == 0) {
711            if (! Character.isJavaIdentifierStart(c))
712               return false;
713         } else {
714            if (! Character.isJavaIdentifierPart(c))
715               return false;
716         }
717      }
718      return true;
719   }
720
721   private void signal(ConfigEvents changes) {
722      if (Utils.isNotEmpty(changes))
723         listeners.forEach(x -> x.onConfigChange(changes));
724   }
725
726   private ConfigEvents findDiffs(String updatedContents) throws IOException {
727      var changes2 = new ConfigEvents();
728      var newMap = new ConfigMap(store, name, updatedContents);
729
730      // Imports added.
731      for (var i : newMap.imports) {
732         if (! imports.contains(i)) {
733            for (var s : i.getConfigMap().entries.values()) {
734               for (var e : s.oentries.values()) {
735                  if (! newMap.hasEntry(s.name, e.key)) {
736                     changes2.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, s.name, e.key, e.value, e.modifiers, e.comment, e.preLines));
737                  }
738               }
739            }
740         }
741      }
742
743      // Imports removed.
744      for (var i : imports) {
745         if (! newMap.imports.contains(i)) {
746            for (var s : i.getConfigMap().entries.values()) {
747               for (var e : s.oentries.values()) {
748                  if (! newMap.hasEntry(s.name, e.key)) {
749                     changes2.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
750                  }
751               }
752            }
753         }
754      }
755
756      for (var ns : newMap.oentries.values()) {
757         var s = oentries.get(ns.name);
758         if (s == null) {
759            for (var ne : ns.entries.values()) {
760               changes2.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, ns.name, ne.key, ne.value, ne.modifiers, ne.comment, ne.preLines));
761            }
762         } else {
763            for (var ne : ns.oentries.values()) {
764               var e = s.oentries.get(ne.key);
765               if (e == null || Utils.ne(e.value, ne.value)) {
766                  changes2.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, s.name, ne.key, ne.value, ne.modifiers, ne.comment, ne.preLines));
767               }
768            }
769            for (var e : s.oentries.values()) {
770               var ne = ns.oentries.get(e.key);
771               if (ne == null) {
772                  changes2.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
773               }
774            }
775         }
776      }
777
778      for (var s : oentries.values()) {
779         var ns = newMap.oentries.get(s.name);
780         if (ns == null) {
781            for (var e : s.oentries.values())
782               changes2.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
783         }
784      }
785
786      return changes2;
787   }
788
789   // This method should only be called from behind a lock.
790   private String asString() {
791      try {
792         var sw = new StringWriter();
793         for (var cs : entries.values())
794            cs.writeTo(sw);
795         return sw.toString();
796      } catch (IOException e) {
797         throw asRuntimeException(e);  // Not possible.
798      }
799   }
800
801   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
802   // ConfigSection
803   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
804
805   class ConfigSection {
806
807      final String name;   // The config section name, or blank if the default section.  Never null.
808
809      final List<String> preLines = synced(Utils.list());
810      private final String rawLine;
811
812      final Map<String,ConfigMapEntry> oentries = synced(map());
813      final Map<String,ConfigMapEntry> entries = synced(map());
814
815      /**
816       * Constructor.
817       */
818      ConfigSection(String name) {
819         this.name = name;
820         this.rawLine = "[" + name + "]";
821      }
822
823      /**
824       * Constructor.
825       */
826      ConfigSection(List<String> lines) {
827
828         String name2 = null, rawLine2 = null;
829
830         final int
831            S1 = 1, // Looking for section.
832            S2 = 2; // Found section, looking for end.
833
834         var state = S1;
835         var start = 0;
836
837         for (var i = 0; i < lines.size(); i++) {
838            var l = lines.get(i);
839            var c = StringUtils.firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
840            if (state == S1) {
841               if (c == '[') {
842                  var i1 = l.indexOf('[');
843                  var i2 = l.indexOf(']');
844                  name2 = l.substring(i1+1, i2).trim();
845                  rawLine2 = l;
846                  state = S2;
847                  start = i+1;
848               } else {
849                  preLines.add(l);
850               }
851            } else {
852               if (c != '#' && l.indexOf('=') != -1) {
853                  var e = new ConfigMapEntry(l, lines.subList(start, i));
854                  if (entries.containsKey(e.key))
855                     throw new ConfigException("Duplicate entry found in section [{0}] of configuration:  {1}", name2, e.key);
856                  entries.put(e.key, e);
857                  start = i+1;
858               }
859            }
860         }
861
862         this.name = name2;
863         this.rawLine = rawLine2;
864         this.oentries.putAll(entries);
865      }
866
867      ConfigSection addEntry(String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
868         var e = new ConfigMapEntry(key, value, modifiers, comment, preLines);
869         this.entries.put(e.key, e);
870         return this;
871      }
872
873      ConfigSection setPreLines(List<String> preLines) {
874         this.preLines.clear();
875         this.preLines.addAll(preLines);
876         return this;
877      }
878
879      Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
880         for (var s : preLines)
881            w.append(s).append('\n');
882
883         if (! name.isEmpty())
884            w.append(rawLine).append('\n');
885         else {
886            // Need separation between default prelines and first-entry prelines.
887            if (! preLines.isEmpty())
888               w.append('\n');
889         }
890
891         for (var e : entries.values())
892            e.writeTo(w);
893
894         return w;
895      }
896   }
897
898   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
899   // Import
900   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
901
902   class Import {
903
904      private final ConfigMap configMap;
905      private final Map<ConfigEventListener,ConfigEventListener> listenerMap = synced(map());
906
907      Import(ConfigMap configMap) {
908         this.configMap = configMap;
909      }
910
911      synchronized Import register(Collection<ConfigEventListener> listeners) {
912         listeners.forEach(this::register);
913         return this;
914      }
915
916      synchronized Import register(final ConfigEventListener listener) {
917         var l2 = (ConfigEventListener) events -> {
918            var events2 = events.stream().filter(x -> ! hasEntry(x.getSection(), x.getKey())).collect(Collectors.toCollection(ConfigEvents::new));
919            if (!events2.isEmpty())
920               listener.onConfigChange(events2);
921         };
922         listenerMap.put(listener, l2);
923         configMap.register(l2);
924         return this;
925      }
926
927      synchronized Import unregister(final ConfigEventListener listener) {
928         configMap.unregister(listenerMap.remove(listener));
929         return this;
930      }
931
932      synchronized Import unregisterAll() {
933         listenerMap.values().forEach(configMap::unregister);
934         listenerMap.clear();
935         return this;
936      }
937
938      String getConfigName() {
939         return configMap.name;
940      }
941
942      ConfigMap getConfigMap() {
943         return configMap;
944      }
945
946      @Override
947      public boolean equals(Object o) {
948         return o instanceof Import ir && ir.getConfigName().equals(getConfigName());
949      }
950
951      @Override
952      public int hashCode() {
953         return getConfigName().hashCode();
954      }
955   }
956}
